name: Tractor Beam
Lore: 'Captures enemy vessels for boarding. When used in conjunction with an ion cannon, tractor beams can ensnare even the most maneuverable starships.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on your Star Destroyer. At the end of a battle at same system or sector, may target an opponent''s starship present (except Mon Calamari Star Cruiser) using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target captured if destiny > defense value.',
